description: Official command-line interface for testing internet bandwidth using https://speedtest.net. Note: some platforms link speedtest to speedtest-cli or other tools like librespeed, which can also be installed as speedtest on certain Linux distributions. These command examples apply only to the official client. More information: https://www.speedtest.net/apps/cli.
